original_title: ‘Moral imperative’: Hundreds of UK business leaders demand action on Israel | Israel-Palestine conflict News | Al Jazeera
article_summary: "UK Business Leaders Call for Action Against Israel Over Gaza Crisis: A group of 762 business leaders, including former royal adviser Jonathon Porritt and sustainability consultant Adam Garfunkel, are urging the UK government to halt arms trade with Israel, sanction violators of international law, and enforce human rights principles in response to the worsening crisis in Gaza."</s>
